In: Bauddhasāhityastabakāvalī, Essays and Studies on Buddhist Sanskrit Literature dedicated to Claus Vogel by Colleagues, Students, and Friends, ed. D. Dimitrov, M. Hahn, and R. Steiner. Marburg 2008 (Indica et Tibetica, 36), pp. 339-351.
' = avagraha, not written in the MS
⟨...⟩ = omitted akṣara or corrected vocal quantity (.⟨ā⟩ corrected from .a)

K. Wille: "Neue Fragmente des Candrasūtra". In: Bauddhasāhityastabakāvalī, Essays and Studies on Buddhist Sanskrit Literature dedicated to Claus Vogel by Colleagues, Students, and Friends, ed. D. Dimitrov, M. Hahn, and R. Steiner. Marburg 2008 (Indica et Tibetica, 36), pp. 339-351.

The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.
Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as
elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in
elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.
Characters Used for the Transliteration of Sanskrit according to IAST
LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH MACRON
LATIN SMALL LETTER I WITH MACRON
LATIN SMALL LETTER U WITH MACRON
LATIN SMALL LETTER R WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER R WITH DOT BELOW AND MACRON
LATIN SMALL LETTER L WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER L WITH DOT BELOW AND MACRON
LATIN SMALL LETTER M WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER H WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER N WITH DOT ABOVE
LATIN SMALL LETTER N WITH TILDE
LATIN SMALL LETTER T WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER D WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER N WITH DOT BELOW
LATIN SMALL LETTER S WITH ACUTE
LATIN SMALL LETTER S WITH DOT BELOW

arhantaṃ sugataṃ loke candramāḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
tamonudaṃ taṃ nabhasi prabhākaraṃ virocanaṃ śukla
